001import javax.swing.*;
002import java.awt.*;
003import java.awt.event.*;
004import java.net.URL;
005
006/**
007 * Cette classe implémente une interface utilisateur graphique simple avec 
008 * une zone de saisie de texte, une zone de sortie de texte et une image 
009 * optionnelle.
010 * 
011 * @author CLEMENT RUAN
012 * @version 2026
013 */
014public class UserInterface implements ActionListener
015{
016    /**
017     * Moteur du jeu
018     */
019    private GameEngine aEngine;
020    /**
021     * Fenêtre principal du jeu
022     */
023    private JFrame aMyFrame;
024    /**
025     * Champ de saisie de texte
026     */
027    private JTextField aEntryField;
028    /**
029     * Zone d'affichage du texte ou historique du jeu
030     */
031    private JTextArea aLog;
032    /**
033     * Affichage de l'image
034     */
035    private JLabel aImage;
036    /**
037     * Bouton pour afficher les commandes disponible
038     */
039    private JButton aHelpButton;
040    /**
041     * Bouton pour afficher les différentes descriptions de la pièce actuelle
042     */
043    private JButton aLookButton;
044    /**
045     * Bouton pour quitter le jeu
046     */
047    private JButton aQuitButton;
048    /**
049     * Bouton pour revenir à la pièce précédente
050     */
051    private JButton aBackButton;
052    /**
053     * Bouton pour regarder à l'inventaire du joueur
054     */
055    private JButton aInventoryButton;
056
057    /**
058     * Construct a UserInterface. As a parameter, a Game Engine
059     * (an object processing and executing the game commands) is
060     * needed.
061     * 
062     * @param pGameEngine  The GameEngine object implementing the game logic.
063     */
064    public UserInterface( final GameEngine pGameEngine )
065    {
066        this.aEngine = pGameEngine;
067        this.createGUI();
068    } // UserInterface(.)
069
070    /**
071     * Print out some text into the text area.
072     * 
073     * @param pText Le texte affiché
074     */
075    public void print( final String pText )
076    {
077        this.aLog.append( pText );
078        this.aLog.setCaretPosition( this.aLog.getDocument().getLength() );
079    } // print(.)
080
081    /**
082     * Print out some text into the text area, followed by a line break.
083     * 
084     * @param pText Le texte affiché
085     */
086    public void println( final String pText )
087    {
088        this.print( pText + "\n" );
089    } // println(.)
090
091    /**
092     * Show an image file in the interface.
093     * 
094     * @param pImageName Chemin du ficher de l'image
095     */
096    public void showImage( final String pImageName )
097    {
098        String vImagePath = "" + pImageName; // to change the directory
099        URL vImageURL = this.getClass().getClassLoader().getResource( vImagePath );
100        if ( vImageURL == null )
101            System.out.println( "Image not found : " + vImagePath );
102        else {
103            ImageIcon vIcon = new ImageIcon( vImageURL );
104            this.aImage.setIcon( vIcon );
105            this.aMyFrame.pack();
106        }
107    } // showImage(.)
108
109    /**
110     * Enable or disable input in the entry field.
111     * 
112     * @param pOnOff True active les entrées, False désactive
113     */
114    public void enable( final boolean pOnOff )
115    {
116        this.aEntryField.setEditable( pOnOff );// enable/disable
117        this.aHelpButton.setEnabled( pOnOff );
118        this.aLookButton.setEnabled( pOnOff );
119        this.aBackButton.setEnabled( pOnOff );
120        this.aInventoryButton.setEnabled( pOnOff );
121        this.aQuitButton.setEnabled( pOnOff );
122        if ( pOnOff ) { // enable
123            this.aEntryField.getCaret().setBlinkRate( 500 ); // cursor blink
124            this.aEntryField.addActionListener( this ); // reacts to entry
125        }
126        else { // disable
127            this.aEntryField.getCaret().setBlinkRate( 0 ); // cursor won't blink
128            this.aEntryField.removeActionListener( this ); // won't react to entry
129        }
130    } // enable(.)
131
132    /**
133     * Set up graphical user interface.
134     */
135    private void createGUI()
136    {
137        this.aMyFrame = new JFrame( "The Steles of Antevia" );
138        this.aEntryField = new JTextField( 34 );
139
140        this.aLog = new JTextArea();
141        this.aLog.setEditable( false );
142        JScrollPane vListScroller = new JScrollPane( this.aLog );
143        vListScroller.setPreferredSize( new Dimension(200, 200) );
144        vListScroller.setMinimumSize( new Dimension(100,100) );
145        
146        // Ajouts des boutons
147        this.aImage = new JLabel();
148        this.aHelpButton = new JButton("Help");
149        this.aBackButton = new JButton("Back");
150        this.aLookButton = new JButton("Look");
151        this.aQuitButton = new JButton("Quit");
152        this.aInventoryButton = new JButton("Inventory");
153        
154        // Écouteurs sur les boutons
155        this.aHelpButton.addActionListener( this );
156        this.aBackButton.addActionListener( this );
157        this.aLookButton.addActionListener( this );
158        this.aQuitButton.addActionListener( this );
159        this.aInventoryButton.addActionListener( this );
160        
161        // Pour organiser les boutons
162        JPanel vButtonPanel = new JPanel();
163        vButtonPanel.setLayout(new GridLayout(3,2));
164        vButtonPanel.add(this.aHelpButton);
165        vButtonPanel.add(this.aBackButton);
166        vButtonPanel.add(this.aLookButton);
167        vButtonPanel.add(this.aInventoryButton);
168        vButtonPanel.add(this.aQuitButton);
169
170        JPanel vPanel = new JPanel();
171        vPanel.setLayout( new BorderLayout() ); // ==> only five places
172        vPanel.add( this.aImage, BorderLayout.NORTH );
173        vPanel.add( vListScroller, BorderLayout.CENTER );
174        vPanel.add( this.aEntryField, BorderLayout.SOUTH );
175        vPanel.add( vButtonPanel, BorderLayout.EAST ); // Place les boutons à droite 
176
177        this.aMyFrame.getContentPane().add( vPanel, BorderLayout.CENTER );
178
179        // add some event listeners to some components
180        this.aEntryField.addActionListener( this );
181
182        // to end program when window is closed
183        this.aMyFrame.addWindowListener(
184            new WindowAdapter() { // anonymous class
185                @Override public void windowClosing(final WindowEvent pE)
186                {
187                    System.exit(0);
188                }
189        } );
190
191        this.aMyFrame.pack();
192        this.aMyFrame.setVisible( true );
193        this.aEntryField.requestFocus();
194    } // createGUI()
195
196    /**
197     * Actionlistener interface for entry textfield.
198     */
199    @Override public void actionPerformed( final ActionEvent pE ) 
200    {
201        // no need to check the type of action at the moment
202        // because there is only one possible action (text input) :
203        String vCommand = pE.getActionCommand();
204        
205        if (vCommand.equals("Help"))
206        {
207            this.aEngine.interpretCommand("help");
208        } 
209        else if (vCommand.equals("Back"))
210        {
211            this.aEngine.interpretCommand("back");
212        } 
213        else if (vCommand.equals("Look"))
214        {
215            this.aEngine.interpretCommand("look");
216        } 
217        else if (vCommand.equals("Inventory"))
218        {
219            this.aEngine.interpretCommand("inventory");
220        } 
221        else if (vCommand.equals("Quit"))
222        {
223            this.aEngine.interpretCommand("quit");
224        } 
225        else 
226        {
227            this.processCommand(); // never suppress this line
228        }
229    } // actionPerformed(.)
230
231    /**
232     * A command has been entered in the entry field.  
233     * Read the command and do whatever is necessary to process it.
234     */
235    private void processCommand()
236    {
237        String vInput = this.aEntryField.getText();
238        this.aEntryField.setText( "" );
239
240        this.aEngine.interpretCommand( vInput );
241    } // processCommand()
242} // UserInterface 
243
